newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: Malaysia Ekran awards contract to IMPSA.
newsitem.headline: Malaysia Ekran awards contract to IMPSA.

text.p: Argentine metal equipment and turbine maker IMPSA signed two agreements on Friday to supply equipment for Malaysia's giant Bakun dam project.

Bakun dam builder Ekran Bhd awarded a contract to IMPSA Malaysia Sdn Bhd, a subsidiary of the state firm, to supply turbines, hydraulic equipment and other machinery for the 13.6 billion ringgit ($5.5 billion) dam in Malaysia's Borneo state of Sarawak.
Ekran executive chairman Ting Pek Khiing declined to give an exact figure for the contract at the signing ceremony except to say it was a "multi-million ringgit" one.
